page.title: 13A Warsop Child's Schoolday.
page.content: I get up in the morning,get dressed and have my breakfast.Sometimes I play games on my computer.I go upstairs and get ready for school.I put my school things in a bag and call for my friends,Rebecca and Suzanne. We arrive at school at about 8.45a.m. School is from 9a.m.to 3.15p.m.with a 15mins.break at 10.30a.m.and a 10mins. break at 2.20p.m.Dinner break is from 12.3Op.m. to 1.15p.m. After school I walk home, have some tea and then play outside when the weather is fine. I come in at about 8.OOp.m. and watch television. About 9.OOp.m. I go upstairs and get ready for bed. Mum usually lets me read for 1O minutes and then I turn out the light and I go to sleep.
